resources.string: The Gateway Hotel, 66, Ground Floor,The Gateway Hotel, 560025
Dishes from across India\'s south west appear on the menu of this classical hotel restaurant.
Live music, good service and the best barbecue place in bangalore
93/A, 4th B Cross Rd, Industrial Layout, Koramangala,560095
A go to place for students to professionals to families.The food is right amount of taste and price.Truffles is the highlight of every college group
24, Lavelle Road, Shanthala Nagar, Ashok Nagar, 560001
A real cozy and a must try place in posh p[arts of bangalore.Glen\'s has an equal veg and non-veg menu.The cakes and sundaes are to die for.The pizza\'s are equally delicious
LG09, Sky Walk,Assaye Rd,5th Block,Pulikeshi Nagar,560008
Brick walls and eclectic design give a funky edge to this international restaurant and lounge bar.
Amusement park with roller coasters, a ferris wheel and water rides, plus virtual reality experiences.

If you are looking for some adernaline rush and like to burn rubber on asphalt this is the place. Grips Gokarting is the only place in Bangalore which boasts of a very well designed multi-level track, with interesting corners
Orion Mall, 4th Floor, Brigade Orion Mall, Dr Rajkumar Road,560055

Simply speaking what T-20 has done to the sport of cricket in India, bluO has done the same to the sport of bowling. In other words, bluO is a concoction of fun + bowling, world cuisine, music, adventure coming together
5, Jayamahal, Fun World Complex, Opposite TV Tower, J C Nagar, 560006
Ice and snow-themed indoor amusement park featuring frozen slides, rides and other family activities.
Palace Grounds, Opposite to TV Tower, J.C.Nagar,560006

An Amusement park for everyone, we are home to some the best thrill seeking enthusiast for the daredevils, exciting rides for the little fun seekers and rides that the entire family can enjoy. You can enjoy rides like tsunami, rollercoaster, The curse of the black pearl, the Yahooooo slide, the bumper car and lots more.
Lalbagh or Lalbagh Botanical Gardens, meaning The Red Garden in English, is a well known botanical garden in southern Bengaluru.
Cubbon Park is a landmark \'lung\' area of the Bengaluru city, located within the heart of city in the Central Administrative Area.
22/1, Tank Bund Rd, Brindavan Nagar, Mathikere,560054
City greenspace with walking/jogging paths, a swimming pool, a musical fountain and play equipment.
A perfect place for nature lovers to have a few moments amidst refreshing nature and calm surroundings, lake also attracts visitors who are looking for some fun filled activities.
Lumbini Gardens is a public park on the banks of the Nagawara Lake in Bangalore, Karnataka, India named after Lumbini of Nepal dedicated to Lord Buddha.
Bangalore Palace, a palace located in Bengaluru, Karnataka, India, was built by Rev. J. Garrett, who was the first Principal of the Central High School in Bangalore, now known as Central College
Vidhana Soudha, Ambedkar Veedhi, Sampangi Rama Nagar,560001

The Vidhana Soudha located in Bengaluru, is the seat of the state legislature of Karnataka. It is an imposing building, constructed in a style sometimes described as Mysore Neo-Dravidian,and incorporates elements of Indo-Saracenic and Dravidian styles. The construction was completed in 1956.

Nandi Hills or Nandi betta is an ancient hill fortress in southern India, in the Chikkaballapur district of Karnataka state. It is 10 km from Chickballapur town and approximately 60 km from the city of Bengaluru.
Sri Radha Krishna Temple has deities of Radha and Krishna located at Rajajinagar, in North Bangalore, Karnataka, India. It is one of the largest ISKCON temples in the world.
Movie studio and amusement park featuring reality TV set tours and several family-oriented attractions.
